key_risks: Regulatory and compliance risks, including penalties and oversight by the OCC
Cybersecurity vulnerabilities and potential data breaches
Economic sensitivity to regional downturns in the Delaware Valley

67 complaints recorded by the Better Business Bureau in the last three years
social_issues: Customer dissatisfaction reflected in consumer complaints
Potential operational issues impacting customer service
governance_issues: Leadership changes and strategic initiatives introducing execution risks
